completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of height 2 to color Y.
Extend the color of the topmost row until the next row.
Recolor all objects of minimum height to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color B, that are neighbors to at least one R, to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color B that are neighbors of color R, except the object remaining on the grid.
Recolor all objects of color B to color Y.
Recolor all objects adjacent to R to color Y.
Recolor the superstrings of objects of color R to color Y.
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color Y
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color Y
Change all 'C' colored objects to 'Y' colored if they are neighbors of any 'R' colored object.
Recolor all objects that have a neighboring cell of color `R`, to color `Y`.
Recolor all red objects to yellow.
Recolor all the objects with size greater than 3 to color Y.
Change the color of the objects in row 2 and 3 to color Y.
Recolor objects of size equal or greater than 4 to color Y.
Recolor objects neighboring the R objects to Y
Recolor all objects except for those of color B and O to color Y.
Recolor objects whose rows and columns contain objects with colors R after the first occurrence of color R, and update them to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color B that are neighbors with an object of color R to color Y.
Recolor the rows containing an orange object to color Y.
Recolor all R objects of size greater than 1 to Y.
Recolor all objects except R to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color B to color Y.
Recolor all objects to color Y except the ones colored B and R.
Recolor all objects of size equal to 2 or 3 to color Y
Recolor all objects of color B such that they change color based on neighboring objects of color R. If neighboring with R change color to Y
Recolor objects that are adjacent to the color R to the color Y.
Change the color of the maximum size objects containing color R to color Y.
Recolor all objects that contain the color R to color Y.
Recolor some of the objects to color Y
Recolor only the objects that have an object of color R inside them to color Y.
Recolor all objects adjacent to a red object to yellow.
Change the color of objects of color B to color Y, if they are neighbors of an object of color R.
Recolor all red objects to yellow.
Recolor all red objects to yellow.
Recolor objects having the smallest size (size 1) to color Y.
Change the color of the objects bordering the right or upper edge of other objects to color Y.
Recolor the first object in each row to color Y if it is R.
Recolor all objects of color B to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color B such that they do not neighbor any object of color O.
Change the color of all objects colored R to color Y.
Recolor the objects in the upper rows, where the object's color is similar to the diagonal 'B' shape in the first pair, and change their color to Y
Recolor the middle neighbors of the R's to Y.
Update the color of all objects neighboring an 'R' object to 'Y'.
Recolor the objects that are formed by repeating characters where all characters are connected as well.
Change all R objects to Y
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color Y.
Update the color of all objects where two adjacent objects have a different color. The new color is the color of the object on the bottom.
Recolor intermediate objects in large connected regions from B to Y and G to Y.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) max) (color_equals (color_of this) B)))
        (apply (update_color Y))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) max) (color_equals (color_of this) G)))
        (apply (update_color Y))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Change the color of the bottom right objects, which are enclosed by other neighboring objects, to color Y.

Recolor all objects of color B to color Y.
